Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Since January 2008: Member of the Editorial Board of the Central and Eastern European Review of Economics and Finance (Radom University Press)
2009-2011: Managing Editor of the Review of Economics and Institutions, University of Perugia Press (www.rei.unipg.it)
Dal 2012: member of the editorial board of “Economic Systems” (Elsevier)
2012: Guest Editor in “Economic Systems” (Elsevier): Symposium issue on “Comparing Inequalities” (with David Aristei), Vol. 36, anno 2012
Since November 2012: Member of the Editorial Board of the Review of Economics and Institutions (Perugia University Press)

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Organizzazione di conferenze e workshop scientifici di rilevanza internazionale: - 2015: Member of the scientific and of the organizing committee of the Jean Monnet SWING Chair Conference: “Institutions, inequality and the process of European Integration”, Perugia, Italy, 20/21 July 2015 - 2014: Member of the scientific and of the organizing committee of the 3nd Biannual Assisi workshop on Economics and Institutions: “Technology, Inequality and Institutions in Europe”, Assisi, Italy, 20/21 february 2014 - 2012: Organisation and Chair of two panels on “Comparing inequalities” at the 12° International EACES (European Association for Comparative Economic Studies) Conference, University of the West of Scotland, Paisley (UK) (with J. Holscher, Unversity of Brighton), 6-8 September - 2012: Member of the scientific and of the organizing committee of the 2nd Biannual Assisi workshop on Economics and Institutions: “Productivity, Institutions, services”, Assisi, Italy, 21/22 Giugno 2012 - August 2011: Member of the scientific and of the organizing committee of the International Conference on Applied Economics 2011, Perugia, Italy, 25-27 agosto 2011 - 2011: Member of the scientific and of the organizing committee of the XVIII Conferenza Scientifica dell’AISSEC (Associazione Italiana per lo Studio dei Sistemi Economici Comparati), Macerata, 25/27 Giugno 2011 - 2010: Member of the scientific and of the organizing committee of the 1st Biannual Assisi workshop on Economics and Institutions: “Comparing Inequalities”, Assisi, Italy, 22/23 Giugno 2010 - 2009: Member of the scientific and of the organizing committee of the XVII Conferenza Scientifica dell’AISSEC (Associazione Italiana per lo Studio dei Sistemi Economici Comparati), Perugia, 25/27 Giugno 2009 - 2006: Member of the scientific and of the organizing committee of the workshop: “La sicurezza degli alimenti tra conoscenza scientifica ed aspettative dei consumatori”, Università di Perugia, 10-11 Marzo 2006

Microdata empirics (6 hours)

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Partecipazione a gruppo di ricerca con collaborazioni nazionali e internazionali: - 2010-2014: EU 7th Framework Programme, Funding Scheme: Marie Curie Actions: ”The Political Economy of Youth Unemployment (project number 269134), Duration: 48 months. - 2010-2013: Cassa di Risparmio di Perugia Fundation project: “Productivity, Istitutions, Services”. Duration: 36 months. University of Perugia. - 2010-2013: Cassa di Risparmio di Perugia Fundation project: “School-to-work transition patterns. Institutional, sectoral and territorial aspects under a comparative perspective”. Duration: 36 months. University of Perugia. - 2010-2014: Confindustria Umbria: “Productive systems, population and labour market developments at regional level”. Duration: 48 months. University of Perugia. - 2005-2006: Research project PRIN-COFIN 2005 “Delocalisation and competitivness of Italian firms: a statistic and interpretative picture”, Local Unit Coordinator: Pierluigi Daddi, University of Perugia. - 2003-2004: Research project PRIN-COFIN 2003 “Producer’s liability and investments for the supplì of safe food”, Local Unit Coordinator: Tommaso Sediari, University of Perugia. - 2000-2002: Research project CNR 2000 “Negotiated programming and local development”, Local Unit Coordinator: Tommaso Sediari, University of Perugia. - 1998-1999: Research project MURST-PRIN 1998 “A territorial analysis of economic change in Italy”, Local Unit Coordinator: Pierluigi Grasselli, University of Perugia - Dal 2008: Research Project Fondazione Cassa di Risparmio di Perugia: “School to work transition patterns and youth employment”, Coordinator: Marcello Signorelli, University of Perugia - Dal 2008: Research Project Confindustria Umbria – Università di Perugia: “Productive systems, Population and Labour market from a regional perspective”, Coordinator: Bruno Bracalente, University of Perugia - 2007-2008: Research Project Università di Perugia, Polo scientifico-didattico di Terni “Internationalisation patterns, multinationals firms, manufacturing systems”, Coordinator: Tommaso Sediari, University of Perugia - 2006-2007: Rsearch Project Università di Perugia – Regione Umbria “Territorial dimension f the wine industry in Italy”, Coordinator: Tommaso Sediari, University of Perugia - 2004-2005: Research project Fondazione Cassa di Risparmio di Perugia “Proposta di un nuovo modello per governare il cambiamento del sistema delle imprese umbre”, Coordinator: Giuseppe Calzoni/Pierluigi Graselli, University of Perugia. - 2001-2003: Research Project, European Union - ESF: “Umbria Network Sistema Lavoro”, Coordinator: Cristiano Perugini, University of Perugia - 2003: Research project Fondazione Cassa di Risparmio di Perugia “Food industry in Umbria region”, Coordinator: Cristiano Perugini, University of Perugia.
